ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you used any cannabis over the past twelve months?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: How often do you use cannabis or marijuana products?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Monthly or less; 2=2-4 times a month; 3=2-3 times a week; 4=4 or more times; -5= Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: How many hours were you stoned on a typical day when you had been using cannabis or marijuana products?
Notes: 0=Less than 1; 1=1 or 2; 2=3 or 4; 3=5 or 6; 4=7 or more; -5= Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: How often during the past 6 months did you find that you were not able to stop using cannabis or marijuana once you had started?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Less than monthly; 2=Monthly; 3=Weekly; 4=Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: How often during the past 6 months did you fail to do what was normally expected from you because of using cannabis or marijuana?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Less than monthly; 2=Monthly; 3=Weekly; 4=Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months have you devoted a great deal of your time to getting, using, or recovering from cannabis or marijuana?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Less than monthly; 2=Monthly; 3=Weekly; 4=Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months have you had a problem with your memory or concentration after using cannabis or marijuana?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Less than monthly; 2=Monthly; 3=Weekly; 4=Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: How often do you use cannabis or marijuana products in situations that could be physically hazardous, such as driving, operating machinery, or caring for children:
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Less than monthly; 2=Monthly; 3=Weekly; 4=Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: Have you ever thought about cutting down, or stopping, your use of cannabis?
Notes: 0=Never; 2=Yes, but not in the past 6 months; 4=Yes, during the past 6 months; -5= Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete, item not seen)

ElementDescription: CUDIT-R Score
Notes: Sum the responses to questions 1-8

ElementDescription: How often during the past 6 months did you need to use cannabis or marijuana in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy session?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Less than monthly; 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: How often during the past 6 months did you have a feeling of guilt or remorse after using cannabis or marijuana?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Less than monthly; 2 = Monthly; 3 = Weekly; 4 = Daily or almost daily

ElementDescription: Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your use of cannabis or marijuana over the past 6 months?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: Has a relative, friend or a doctor or other health worker been concerned about your use of cannabis or marijuana or suggested you cut down over the past 6 months?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: How old were you the first time you felt stoned from using cannabis or marijuana products? Your best guess is OK.
Notes: 1= Age 6 or before; 2= Age 7; 3= Age 8; 4= Age 9; 5= Age 10; 6= Age 11; 7= Age 12; 8= Age 13; 9= Age 14; 10= Age 15; 11= Age 16; 12= Age 17; 13= Age 18; 14= Age 19; 15= Age 20; 16= Age 21; 17= Age 22 or later; 18= I have not yet felt stoned from using cannabis or marijuana products.

ElementDescription: How old were you when you first started using cannabis or marijuana products regularly, that is, at least once a month, for 6 months or more? Your best guess is OK.
